name: Rubber Wrestling
description:
THIS IS A TWO PLAYER GAME

Take turns to move towards the opponent and pin them. Player that pins his opponent is the winner!

No win conditions are set, so feel free to make your own rules.

-------------------------------

The year is 2094 in post-apocalyptic Malaysia. Radiation poisoning has killed most of the population. The remnants of humanity scour the earth for whatever supplies they can get. 

Then, one day, a box of country-themed erasers is found, and almost immediately a tournament of champions is formed.

There will be no mercy. There can be no mistake. This is life or death.

This.
Is.
RUBBER WRESTLING!
